overview:
“Kevin has more than 11 years experience in the student lending business. He was an early employee of First Marblehead, the leading provider of back-office services for private student loans. He led the companyâ€™s GATE Student Loan program and worked closely with financial aid and finance professionals at dozens of colleges and universities. Most recently he was SVP for Marketing. In addition to his time at First Marblehead, Kevin also served as a Principal at the management consulting firm, The Parthenon Group, where he advised CEOs in financial services, publishing, and manufacturing on business strategy. Kevin also founded and ran an education company in Russia. Kevin holds a BA from Amherst and an MBA from Harvard.”

(Source: SimpleTuition)
